description.name: ethbase
description.tagline: Ethereum base Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto base-eth Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Ethereum base directly on your website
Unique base/eth receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your base/eth wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
